you wouldn't happen to have the 52 Annual Academy Awards would you?

Thanks for starting the seed again. Its an old file but I wanted this years Oscar show since it was John Wayne's last public appearance and just 3 months before he died. It was emceed by Johnny Carson which makes it all the better. Thanks whoever you are.
